meanings.sent1: The unfelted fabric was rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The unfelted wool retained its natural texture.
meanings.sent3: She tried to sew the unfelted material, but it kept fraying.
meanings.sent4: The unfelted cloth whispered in the wind like fallen leaves.
meanings.sent5: The unfelted fibers stood out like tiny hairs on the surface.

meanings.sent1: The unfelted sweater was loose and airy.
meanings.sent2: The unfelted yarn was delicate and prone to tangling.
meanings.sent3: He mistakenly wore the unfelted socks to a formal event.
meanings.sent4: The unfelted blanket resembled a patchwork of colors and textures.
meanings.sent5: The unfelted edges of the rug curled up slightly, adding a unique charm.
